name: RRRisky Hills
description:
Hyper Casual one button game.

Tap and hold to accelerate, don't make the gem fall off the car.
90 seconds to drive as far as you can.
Use hills as ramps to fly and get bonus points.

------------------------------------------------------

TECH SPECS
------------------------------------------------------

Framework: Phaser 3.21.0

Physics engine: Matter

Lines of code: 553

3rd party libraries: simplify.js

------------------------------------------------------

Soundtack: "The Trance" by Linkaden
Available for licensing or with completely explained source code.
Learn to build your own games: www.emanueleferonato.com
